newsitem.title: SOUTH KOREA: Samsung Heavy net turns to loss in 1996.
newsitem.headline: Samsung Heavy net turns to loss in 1996.

text.p: Samsung Heavy Industry, a shipbuilding affiliate of the Samsung Group, posted a net loss of 294.6 billion won in calendar 1996 from a profit of 41.2 billion a year earlier, a company report distributed ahead of a shareholders' meeting disclosed on Thursday.
The report said company turnover rose to 3.26 trillion won last year from 2.92 trillion in 1995.
It said falling ship prices, foreign exchange losses and rising interest payments resulted in deteriorating company earnings last year.
Costs attributed to early retirement of employees, encouraged as a method for restructuring the business, also contributed to the loss.
Further details would be announced after the company's shareholder meeting on Friday.
